data.name: Strawberry Punch
data.detailed_description:
• In-depth character customization for your abilities and your style
    Change every detail from the tiny pixel shoes to the accessories in your hair! Every single hair design was painstakingly animated by hand, by me, with accessories re-drawn for every hair to fit perfectly for! every! single! animation!!!



  • Hand-coded physics system to mix platforming and combat together !!!

    Yo if this movement system doesn't blow your mind, nothing will. Look at that verticality!!


  • Play with your entire group of friends, for free, no one left behind!
    Lots of players at the same time! Completely free to play with development funded on Patreon and ko-fi. A browser version will be available, play at school or on the bus, and with controller support, u get the full experience anywhere!!!!


  • Built-in level editor.
    Since I make the tools, why not let u use them!! Make a practice room, a custom hangout, or a super tough challenge!!! It's up to you!!!


  • Peer to peer networking to provide low pings to players all across the world
    You can host an instance of the game anywhere you are, so the gameplay doesn't degrade for players around the globe, far away from the server!!
    (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧


  • Custom rollback netcode
    Hit someone and immediately see the results without waiting for a response from the server, so you don't miss your jumps and combos!!



Hi! I'm Eleanor! (She / Her)
Solo developer of Strawberry Punch, I'm trans and have Asperger's syndrome. I've been working on Strawberry Punch for 5 years already! Can you believe it? A lot has improved, especially my skills!! Have you seen those animations?!? And I'm a programmer!!!! Pretty good right? Hell yeah! I'll keep working on this project for as long as I can and keep improving!! I hope u enjoy it!



Join the Community and Chat with me !!!

data.short_description: Isometric ??? Combat ?!? Platformer ?!! Online Multiplayers !!? Cute Pixels !!!! HELL YES !!!!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: hardware accelerated graphics
  • Additional Notes: An internet connection is required to start the game for the first time for the assets to be loaded / Gamepad Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: hardware accelerated graphics
  • Additional Notes: An internet connection is required to start the game for the first time for the assets to be loaded / Gamepad Recommended

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: hardware accelerated graphics
  • Additional Notes: An internet connection is required to start the game for the first time for the assets to be loaded / Gamepad Recommended
